entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 11:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: W 25 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
